features: KILLS 99.9% of GERMS: This 2 pack of 1-liter bottles of Listerine Freshburst spearmint antiseptic mouthwash kills 99.9% of germs that cause bad breath, plaque & gingivitis for a fresher & cleaner mouth than brushing alone

FIGHT PLAQUE & GINGIVITIS: A germ-killing mouthwash clinically shown to reduce plaque more than brushing & flossing alone by up to 52 percent more & reduce gingivitis by 21 percent more, for a fresh & healthy mouth

MINT FLAVOR: From the #1 dentist recommended brand of OTC mouthwashes, spearmint rinse works to leave mouths feeling clean & refreshed. Freshburst is 99% Naturally Derived* *As per ISO 16128-1:2016 based on average cumulative volume including water

ADA Seal of ACCEPTANCE: As an American Dental Association (ADA)-accepted antiseptic mouthwash, Listerine Freshburst Antiseptic Mouthwash offers 24-hour germ* protection with twice daily use.*Germs that cause plaque, gingivitis & bad breath

WHOLE MOUTH CLEAN: With approximately 8 weeks supply, achieve maximum results from this fresh breath mouthwash by rinsing mouth for 30 seconds twice a day, both morning & night, & experience a refreshing, dentist-clean feeling
body.description: Protect your mouth from germs and get fresh breath with Listerine Freshburst Antiseptic Mouthwash for bad breath. It kills 99.9% of germs that cause bad breath, plaque, and gingivitis for a fresher and cleaner mouth than brushing alone. Clinically shown to reduce 52 percent more plaque and 21 percent more gingivitis than brushing and flossing alone, this antiseptic mouthwash provides a deep clean that cares for your whole mouth. Listerine Freshburst Mouthwash is a recipient of the ADA Seal of Acceptance for fighting, preventing, and reducing plaque and gingivitis. The great tasting Freshburst spearmint flavor of this antiseptic mouthwash leaves your mouth feeling clean and fresh. Achieve maximum results by rinsing with this refreshing oral rinse for 30 seconds twice a day, both morning and night, for 24-hour germ protection. *when used twice daily

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LISTERINE ANTISEPTIC LISTERINE FRESHBURST Antiseptic Mouthwash has a great-tasting spearmint flavor that strikes fear into germs gives you that feeling of whole mouth clean and refreshed. Just 30 seconds of rinsing twice a day for clinically proven oral health benefits & 24-hour protection against germs that cause bad breath, plaque, and gingivitis. Just 30 seconds of rinsing twice a day for clinically proven oral health benefits & 24-hour protection against germs that cause bad breath, plaque, and gingivitis.

GERMS WILL BEG FOR MERCY What happens each time you swish properly? LISTERINE FRESHBURST Antiseptic Mouthwash fights 99.9% of germs that cause plaque and gingivitis. THE BOLDEST OF CLEANS Brushing and flossing only go so far. Adding rinsing with LISTERINE FRESHBURST provides a greater reach for a whole mouth clean. PROTECT AGAINST GINGIVITIS A 30-second rinse, twice-daily with LISTERINE FRESHBURST Antiseptic Mouthwash, gives 21% greater gingivitis reduction compared to brushing alone. #1 DENTIST RECOMMENDED BRAND Be sure to schedule appointments with your dentist at least every 6 months. Don’t be shy to ask your dentist/ hygienist about best oral care habits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Freshness Unleashed - Listerine Zero Alcohol Mouthwash
reviews.reviewText: Listerine Zero Alcohol Mouthwash has been a staple in my oral care routine for many years, and the Cool Mint Flavor has become a new favorite. This alcohol-free oral rinse not only delivers the trusted germ-killing power of Listerine but also offers a refreshing and less intense taste for a thoroughly enjoyable experience.The primary goal of any mouthwash is to keep breath fresh, and Listerine Zero Alcohol excels in this department. The Cool Mint Flavor provides a burst of freshness that lingers, ensuring that bad breath is kept at bay throughout the day. The effectiveness in maintaining oral hygiene is commendable, and I appreciate the confidence it instills in my daily interactions.The decision to go alcohol-free is a game-changer. Unlike traditional mouthwashes that can be harsh, the absence of alcohol in this formula means a gentler experience without sacrificing efficacy. It's a perfect choice for those who prefer a milder yet still powerful mouthwash.Having used the original flavor for years, trying the Cool Mint for the first time was a pleasant surprise. The flavor is invigorating without being overpowering, striking the perfect balance for a refreshing oral rinse. It's a welcome change that adds variety to my oral care routine.Introducing my daughter to Listerine Zero Alcohol was a wise decision. The Cool Mint variant, with its appealing taste and germ-killing benefits, became an instant favorite for her as well. It's a testament to the broad appeal and versatility of this mouthwash.In conclusion, Listerine Zero Alcohol Mouthwash in Cool Mint Flavor is an excellent product that combines freshness, effectiveness, and a delightful taste. Whether you're a longtime user or trying it for the first time, this mouthwash is a standout choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this item “Listerine Freshburst Antiseptic Mouthwash” and I’m very glad that I did! This was a set of two fairly Large bottles of Listerine.. and it was just what I wanted! The item was reasonably priced and I’m very happy with the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A good tasting product that is really strong and actually gets all the bad taste out of your mouth and cleans your gums and teeth really good in my opinion. I remember when they only had the original taste which was really awful but it still worked great but it is nice to have something that's a little easier to The Taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I put a capful in my water flosser, making it a refreshing experience. I choose alcohol-FREE at the suggestion of my dental hygienist, stating mouthwashes containing alcohol can be harmful. Was good enough for me. I would order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It tastes better but be aware of the difference in function
reviews.reviewText: It contains no alcohol so it's less aggressive. But...The other day I was curious what's in and didn't find something that can be a germicide in the ingredients. Then I noticed it only claim to kill germs that cause bad mouth smell. It doesn't say it will be helpful for tooth like killing plaque causing germs. I happen to have a alcohol containing mouthwash to compare. The alcohol version clearly says it will kill germs that causes plaques. so probably next time i will still stick to the alcohol version since i want that effect as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the only brand of mouth wash that I prefer. It works as described. Makes my throat feels scratchy after each use though. My dental surgeon and hygienist do not recommend it but they used it in their office which is contradictory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I will keep buying this, it does not burn at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and Fresh
reviews.reviewText: Listerine leaves your mouth feeling clean and breath smelling fresh.
Nice product. Took too long to deliver but Listerine is always a good mouthwash
